content: People here can probably assist you if you share the email provider information, such as comcast, spectrum, gmail, etc. You, of course, need to contact each email provider to secure your password. You mentioned historic emails. If these were on an IMAP account, they can be accessed, but if it was a POP account, they would have been lost unless consciously saved when rebuilding or replacing the PC.
creator: davidsk

content: This might have been some corruption during install. I suggest downloading current version and installing over the top of your installation.
creator: davidsk

content: Is your message list set for Cards View or Table View? View/Layout/Message List Header has an icon next to the Quick Filter button to set the view. The From or Correspondents column can be displayed in Table View.
creator: sfhowes

content: Try highlighting the message folder, rightclicking and selecting properties and then clicking repair. That often works.
creator: davidsk

content: First thing I'd try is running a Windows PC in Windows safe mode, to test the effect of startup apps like AV, backup software, VPN etc., which are bypassed in safe mode.
creator: sfhowes

content:
You should be able to do that by setting a 'Customized reply header' with this add-on (see picture):

https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-us/thunderbird/addon/changequote/
creator: sfhowes

content: What you are asking is that Thunderbird make a modification to fix a bug in Outlook. I propose that is not Thunderbird's responsibility and I, as a user, would not want to see developer resources spent fixing a problem for Outlook users. However, that's not my call. You're welcome to suggest that at connect.mozilla.org in the IDEAS section to see if fixing Outlook should be attempted. On the contrary, I think bugs in Outlook might encourage some of them to transfer to Thunderbird. I do not suggest reporting in Bugzilla, as this not a bug. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: Stai usando account di tipo IMAP o di tipo POP3? Comunque se si tratta solo di poche email, prova ad salvarle dalla webmail in formato .eml che pu√≤ facilmente essere importato da Thunderbird. In caso, a quando risale l'ultimo backup di cui disponi?

content: looks like the .msf files change and/or a rebuilt continuously ?
creator: kathy.duncan

content: First, I'm a volunteer and have no decision authority. Lookout is maintained by a separate organization and they may be able to make the change you wish to be done. The winmail.dat happens from apparently ill-formed settings by the sender. One option might be to advise them of this. The info page from Thunderbird is here: https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/what-winmaildat-attachment This is not a bug, but if you wish to propose an enhancement, you should consider posting to connect.mozilla.org in the IDEAS section. Thank you.
creator: davidsk

content: In latest thunderbird, there are two views: table and card. At top of message list pane is 'quick filter' button. to its right is a small icon. Click that to change from card view to table view.
creator: davidsk
